original_text: Then the king stood in his place beside the pillar in the temple. He promised the Lord that he would obey the covenant. He agreed to serve the Lord faithfully and to obey his commands, laws and rules. Josiah agreed to obey what was written in the book of God's covenant.
korean_text: 왕이 자기 처소에 서서 여호와 앞에서 언약을 세우되 마음을 다하고 목숨을 다하여 여호와를 순종하고 그의 계명과 법도와 율례를 지켜 이 책에 기록된 언약의 말씀을 이루리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then the king stood in his place
beside the pillar in the temple
that he would obey the covenant
He agreed to serve the Lord faithfully
and to obey his commands, laws and rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그분의 명령, 율법, 규례를 순종하기로 했다

sentences.original_text: what was written in the book of God's covenant
